item.description:
---Please also see message board for some detail info---

Happy New Year! Happy breathing and good energies to all!
With this meetup, we start regular weekly meetings in 2009.

Lets get together on January 25, at 11 am at my home
studio space in Watertown to meet each other and to have
some breathwork Q&A with Christian (who is in town
last week of January), which will be followed by an introductory
Transformational Breathwork session with Christian,
happening in Inner Strength Yoga studio near by.
Session will be held at the studio 12:30-3 PM.

Christian's a master breathwork practitioner of
almost 20 years, so it's a great chance to introduce
yourself to a high quality experience, have
questions answered first-hand and exchange
information and good energies.
To read more about his work:
http://soulfulpower.u... >> About us and
http://soulfulpower.u...
and http://soulfulpower.u...

Looking forward to see everyone so very much!

Change is in the air! ;)

Much love and joy,

Elena
item.name: Breathing get-together & Introductory Breathwork session
